whoWeAre.title: Who Are We?
whoWeAre.description:
Nimetex Groupe is a Tunisian company specialized in sustainable packaging and visual merchandising. Based in Monastir, we serve clients across North Africa and Europe.

Our expertise covers paper packaging, textile packaging, e-commerce solutions, visual merchandising, eco-design, and global sourcing. We are committed to providing sustainable solutions that respect the environment while maximizing our clients' commercial impact.

clients.title: Who Do We Serve?
clients.description:
For nearly 10 years, we have been supporting startups, SMEs, multinationals, and NGOs in their efforts to enhance their products or services, evolve their brand image, and generate additional revenue.

Thanks to our experts in retail, digital, customer relations, and communication, we act at every stage of a product or service lifecycle to create value by proposing innovative levers and solutions.
